quests.name: Fire Alarm
objectives: Listen to the Fairy Godmother and Merlin.
Talk to the Fairy Godmother.

Gather materials for the Icy Enchantment:
  ‧ 3 Tourmaline.
  ‧ 15 Snowball.
  ‧ 5 Dream Shard.
  ‧ 5 Purple Impatiens.
  ‧ 1 Empty Vial.
Craft the Icy Enchantment.
Use the Icy Enchantment in your Inventory.
Use your Watering Can to remove 5 Green Fires in the Forgotten Lands.
Report back to the Fairy Godmother.

Decorate the Forgotten Lands to make them more appealing by adding:
  ‧ 3 Seating.
  ‧ 4 Outdoor Lighting.
  ‧ 25 Paths.
Talk to the Fairy Godmother.
Follow the Fairy Godmother.
Talk to the Fairy Godmother.
rewards: Royal Watering Can upgrade (can remove Green Fires)

quests.name: A Lost Book
objectives:
Fulfill the Villagers' Wishes:
  ‧ Cook some Pumpkin Soup for Anna.
  ‧ ‧ Bring some Pumpkin Soup to Anna.
  ‧ Gather 100 Sticks of any type for Olaf.
  ‧ ‧ Bring the Sticks to Olaf.
  ‧ Gather 3 Amethyst for Ursula.
  ‧ ‧ Bring the Amethysts to Ursula.
Talk to the Fairy Godmother.
Clean up the Fairy Godmother's House to find Merlin's Book.
Talk to the Fairy Godmother.
Put Merlin's Book back on the bookshelf on the left in the Library.
Return to the Fairy Godmother.

quests.name: Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Oops
objectives: Prepare some Peppermint Tea for Minnie.
Make sure you have a Peppermint Tea in your Inventory.
Bring the Peppermint Tea to Minnie.
Take a picture of an object that looks out of place in Minnie's House.
Return to the Fairy Godmother.

Gather the materials:
  ‧ 2 Diamond.
  ‧ 3 Glass.
  ‧ 5 Dream Shard.
  ‧ 5 Crystal.
Ask WALL-E for a Lens.
Bring the materials to the Fairy Godmother.
Use the Enchanted Lens in your Inventory.
Take a picture of the Broken Object in Minnie's House between 4 p.m. and midnight.

Take a picture of the Transformed Objects in the Village between 4 p.m. and midnight.
  ‧ Goofy's new yellow bicycle.
  ‧ Remy's new Espresso Machine.
  ‧ Olaf's parasol.
  ‧ Mother Gothel's mirror.
Return to the Fairy Godmother.

quests.name: A Magical Moment
objectives: Talk to Merlin.

Gather the following materials:
  ‧ Cook a Mint Chocolate.
  ‧ Craft a Basket.
  ‧ 3 White Impatiens.
Talk to Ursula.
Craft the Care Package.
Bring the Care Package to the Fairy Godmother.
Talk to Merlin about the party.

Gather the materials:
  ‧ 80 Dry Wood.
  ‧ 30 Glass.
  ‧ 10 Fabric.
  ‧ 9 Yellow Daisy.
Craft the Fairytale Gazebo.
(Optional) Put on some Elegant Clothing.
Place the Fairytale Gazebo on the Beach.
Celebrate the Fairy Godmother with the Villagers.
Talk to the Fairy Godmother.
Follow the Fairy Godmother to the Forgotten Lands.
Talk to the Fairy Godmother.
Follow the Fairy Godmother to the RIGHT location.
Return to the Fairy Godmother.
